Description: Number of trees sampled to estimate wood specific gravity (from original publication, same as allometry model)

Species could be present in more than one site (specially in North America). I am not sure how to handle that.  | from KAT: there can be multiple records for a single species, which will differ in wsg_id, wsg, site, n_tree, ref_id.
